Food for Thought. Love to All.
“A good traveler has no fixed plans
and is not intent upon arriving.
A good artist lets his intuition
lead him wherever it wants.
A good scientist has freed himself of concepts
and keeps his mind open to what is.

Thus the Master is available to all people
and doesn't reject anyone.
He is ready to use all situations
and doesn't waste anything.
This is called embodying the light.

What is a good man but a bad man's teacher?
What is a bad man but a good man's job?
If you don't understand this, you will get lost,
however intelligent you are.
It is the great secret.”
― Laozi, Tao Te Ching

HAIL, ALL GOOD PEOPLE!

To those Families who are returning to KBA this Fall or to the many who will be joining us for the first time, I bid thee Welcome.

There will be a pre-Registration Day next Thursday, 8/29, from 8-2. Orientation takes about 15 minutes, we highly recommend you come on in, especially if you are new to our system. Come check it out, and we will feed you some lovely snacks in the bargain.

We have a massive number of new Students coming in this Fall - the most ever. I am super excited to see what this year brings.

We will take attendance starting 9/3. Do your five lessons a day Mon-Thur or you will face the Reaper. It's easier to just do your work day by day than face that.

Summer comes to a close. Let's Gear Up and Break some Eggs this Fall! Juniors become Seniors, Seniors become Graduates. It is the Way.

It is an Honor to be in a place where we can help you. Please Honor us in return and you will be amazed at what you can achieve.

~Charles

Hail, Ye Trolls!

The Last Day of Summer School is 7/25 at 1:59 p.m. - no work will be accepted past that time for the Class of 2019. However, if you want to work online during the month of August, you are encouraged to do so.

There is a Parent's Day/Preregistration on Thursday 8/29 from 8-2. You can meet with the Teachers, figure out a plan for the coming school year and eat some sweet snacks!

The first day of school is Tuesday, September 3rd. Attendance will be taken (5 lessons a day) from that point on. Don't pretend you didn't know, it's the same start of school you've been doing since you were 5.

That is all except to say Thank You. If 2019-2020 is going to top 2018-2019, it has its' work cut out for it; this year, our 10th anniversary, was quite an Epic ride. Let's see what we can do.

Love to you all, enjoy a safe and relaxing Summer, and may Fortuna Be With You.

It Is Done.

Charles

You've Got This.
